location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the back cover with 8; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence relating to two incidents in which Persian customs officials were accused of malpractice, one at Lingah in 1947 (ff 2-4) and another in Suzeh in 1950 (ff 5-6).
